title: Please tell how to change the setting mode to my metro phone manually . To make the phone then , A
content: How do I change . The auto fill , spell check . This is a mode that works as a corrected spelling , ruler as a person is typing at that moment.  I Don t know what you call it! But it was a working mode on my phone . When the phone was new to me , after I newly bought the device in retailed store in town. This mode has stoped working and I want it programed again to auto fill any miss spelled words I m typing at a moment.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device
